price: አንተ ነቢዩ ሆይ! አላህን ፍራ፡፡ ከሓዲዎችንና መናፍቃንንም አትታዘዝ፡፡ አላህ ዐዋቂ ጥበበኛ ነውና፡፡
arabic: يَٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلنَّبِيُّ ٱتَّقِ ٱللَّهَ وَلَا تُطِعِ ٱلۡكَٰفِرِينَ وَٱلۡمُنَٰفِقِينَۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ كَانَ عَلِيمًا حَكِيمٗا

version.title: Amharic translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Amharic by Muhammad Sadeq and Muhammad Ath-Thany Habib. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: yāayyuhā al-nabiyu ittaqi al-laha walā tuṭiʿi al-kāfirīna wal-munāfiqīna inna al-laha kāna ʿalīman ḥakīman
